Title: Relates to establishing a public awareness campaign for substance addiction; appropriation
Summary: Relates to establishing a public awareness and education campaign for substance addiction; treatment options; reducing the stigma of seeking help for substance addiction and making an appropriation therefor.
LawCode: Add ยง3309-b, Pub Health L; add ยง99-g, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the state finance law, in relation to establishing a public awareness and education campaign for addiction; treatment options; reducing the stigma of seeking help for addiction; and making an appropriation therefor
